text: Suzanne Fink (born as Suzanne Koch, also known as Suzanne Fink-Koch) is a former German curler and curling coach. She is a former World champion () and two-time (, ). She competed at the 1988 Winter Olympics when curling was a demonstration sport. ==Teams== ===Women's=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col"| Season ! scope="col"| Skip ! scope="col"| Third ! scope="col"| Second ! scope="col"| Lead ! scope="col"| Alternate ! scope="col"| Events |- ! scope="row"| 1980–81 | Almut Hege || Suzanne Koch || Renate Räderer || Ingeborg Stock || || (9th) |- ! scope="row"| 1982–83 | Almut Hege || Josefine Einsle || Suzanne Koch || Petra Tschetsch || || (9th) WCC CR 1982 |- ! scope="row"| 1983–84 | Almut Hege || Josefine Einsle || Suzanne Koch || Petra Tschetsch || || |- ! scope="row"| 1984–85 | Almut Hege || Josefine Einsle || Suzanne Koch || Petra Tschetsch || || |- ! scope="row"| 1985–86 | Almut Hege || Petra Tschetsch || Suzanne Fink || Josefine Einsle || || (6th) |- ! scope="row"| 1987–88 | Andrea Schöpp || Almut Hege-Schöll || Monika Wagner || Suzanne Fink || || OG 1988 (demo) (4th) |- ! scope="row"| 1989–90 | Almut Hege-Schöll || Suzanne Fink || Stefan Rossler || Ina Räderer || Josefine Einsle (WCC) || GWCC 1990 (5th) |} ===Mixed=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col"| Season ! scope="col"| Skip ! scope="col"| Third ! scope="col"| Second ! scope="col"| Lead ! scope="col"| Events |- ! scope="row"| 1989–90 | Uli Sutor || Susanne Fink || Charlie Kapp || Gisela Ibald || GMxCC 1990 |} ==Record as a coach of national teams== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col"| Year ! scope="col"| Tournament, event ! scope="col"| National team ! scope="col"| Place |- | 1999 || 1999 World Junior Curling Championships || (junior women) ||9 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:German female curlers Category:Curlers at the 1988 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic curlers of Germany Category:World curling champions Category:European curling champions Category:German curling champions Category:German curling coaches Category:1957 births Category:Living people
